license.text: This project uses the FontAwesome fix made by Pit Garbe that you can find at https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/ A mention of 'Font Awesome - http://fortawesome.github.com/Font-Awesome' in human-readable source code is considered acceptable attribution (most common on the web). If human readable source code is not available to the end user, a mention in an 'About' or 'Credits' screen is considered acceptable (most common in desktop or mobile software)
